TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Holds instance data associated with a performance counter sample.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example displays the contents of the InstanceData objects that exist in a particular <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory> on the local computer. It first displays a numbered list of <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> categories. After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the sample displays, for each <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory>, the instance data associated with each instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>.
[!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.diagnostics.ins_1_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.ins_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.ins_1_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string instanceName, valuetype System.Diagnostics.CounterSample sample) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of an instance associated with the performance counter.
A taken from the instance specified by the `instanceName` parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the InstanceData class, using the specified sample and performance counter instance.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets the instance name associated with this instance data.
Docs.value: The name of an instance associated with the performance counter.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData> and displays the value of its InstanceName property and other properties.
[!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.diagnostics.ins_8_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.diagnostics.ins_8_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the raw data value associated with the performance counter sample.
Docs.value: The raw value read by the performance counter sample associated with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.Sample%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData> and displays the value of its RawValue property and other properties.
[!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.diagnostics.ins_3_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.diagnostics.ins_3_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the performance counter sample that generated this data.
Docs.value: A taken from the instance specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.InstanceName%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData> and gets the value of its Sample property, which is a reference to a <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterSample>. The example then displays the fields of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterSample>.
[!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.diagnostics.ins_9_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.diagnostics.ins_9_1.vb)]
